description.value:
A Tent to fit two people and their gear. Water Proof and has a Reflective side for warding away hot suns.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Average

Notes: 40 T
